mapper.update: update t_trade t,t_recon_channel_bohai c, t_batch_trade b set t.recon_status = c.TRADE_STATUS, c.RECON_STATUS = 1, t.recon_date = SYSDATE() where ((t.plat_order_no = c.TRADE_ORDER_NO and t.batch_no is null) or (t.batch_no = b.batch_no AND b.file_name is not null AND concat_ws('-',left(b.file_name,24),t.seq_no) = c.TRADE_ORDER_NO)) AND t.payee_bank_card = c.PAYEE_ACCOUNT AND t.payee_name = c.PAYEE_NAME AND t.trade_amount = c.TRADE_AMOUNT AND DATE_FORMAT(t.trade_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{reconDate}

update t_recon_channel_bohai c set c.RECON_STATUS = 2 where not EXISTS (select * from t_trade t,t_batch_trade b where (c.TRADE_ORDER_NO = t.plat_order_no and t.batch_no is null) or (t.batch_no = b.batch_no AND b.file_name is not null AND concat_ws('-',left(b.file_name,24),t.seq_no) = c.TRADE_ORDER_NO)) and c.RECON_STATUS = 0
